department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Vase with low base-rim, wide rounded body and tall,thin, flaring neck. It is covered with white opaque glaze and decorated with symetrical floral pattern with deep blue curving stems, turquoise tiny leaves and tomato red pinks, 5 petaled round flowers and conventionalized floral forms.
medium:
Iznik ware
Slip-coated earthenware with blue and red pigments under clear glaze
title: Vase
